verses.name: Job 19:8
verses.text: He hath fenced up my way that I cannot pass, and he hath set darkness in my paths.

verses.name: Job 19:9
verses.text: He hath stripped me of my glory, and taken the crown from my head.

verses.name: Job 19:10
verses.text: He hath destroyed me on every side, and I am gone: and mine hope hath he removed like a tree.

verses.name: Job 19:11
verses.text: He hath also kindled his wrath against me, and he counteth me unto him as one of his enemies.

verses.name: Job 19:12
verses.text: His troops come together, and raise up their way against me, and encamp round about my tabernacle.
